original_name: Grease: You're the One That I Want!
plot: A talent competition series where the American public ultimately chooses the male and female lead for the 2007 Broadway production of Grease.
plot_en: A talent competition series where the American public ultimately chooses the male and female lead for the 2007 Broadway production of Grease.
plot_es: A talent competition series where the American public ultimately chooses the male and female lead for the 2007 Broadway production of Grease.
title: Grease: You're the One That I Want!
